pr_title: Add a Sampler to force PrioritySampling

timeline.bodyText: Can I suggest something to the effect of priority.sampling.force=keep instead?  This would suggest allowing force to be configured to other states too.
timeline.author: tylerbenson

timeline.message: Change the config property to set ForceKeepSampler

timeline.bodyText: The way I envisioned this is to have a sampler that forces priority to a value defined in the constructor, not specifically to keep.
timeline.author: tylerbenson

replies.bodyText: Changed to ForcePrioritySampler where the priority can be defined in the constructor 👍
replies.author: drodriguezhdez
